sucess-mail-send.title: Email Sent - Order Complete
sucess-mail-send.description: The email has been successfully sent for the requested order.

confirm-order.title: Finalize the order
confirm-order.description: All that's left is to finalize the order!

order-timed-out.title: Order Expired
order-timed-out.description: Your order expired after 30 seconds of inactivity. Please start over.

ask-marque.title: New Order
ask-marque.description: Choose a brand for your order

sucess-send.title: Billing Information Saved
sucess-send.description: Your billing information has been successfully saved

not-order-found.title: We couldn't find your order...
not-order-found.description: Please try creating your order again. An error occurred, and we couldn't find it.

not-account.title: Error
not-account.description: You must have an account to place an order
